医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
交通空气污染与严重的新生儿并发症有关德克萨斯大学西南医学中心的研究人员将 60,000 多名新生儿的记录与空气监测数据进行了匹配，结果表明，怀孕期间接触与交通相关的空气污染与严重的新生儿并发症有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Traffic-air-pollution-linked-to-serious-neonatal-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Traffic-air-pollution-linked-to-serious-neonatal-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b10b5d6-d3e4-49e3-b600-ab3790bd2be1 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:38:31 -0400 Traffic air pollution linked to serious neonatal complications
研究表明患有关节炎的加拿大人具有非常高的恢复能力多伦多大学研究人员发表的一项新研究表明，患有关节炎的加拿大人由于疼痛而活动受到限制，因此具有很高的恢复能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Study-indicates-a-very-high-level-of-resilience-among-Canadians-with-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Study-indicates-a-very-high-level-of-resilience-among-Canadians-with-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba66a263-038b-42fd-9832-7948fcd43208 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:26:17 -0400 Study indicates a very high level of resilience among Canadians with arthritis
哈肯萨克大学医学中心建立新的减肥和代谢健康中心哈肯萨克大学医学中心建立了减肥和代谢健康中心，这是一个综合项目，旨在帮助那些努力减肥的人们实现并维持减肥目​​标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Hackensack-University-Medical-Center-builtes-new-Center-for-Weight-Loss-and-Metabolic-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Hackensack-University-Medical-Center-builtes-new-Center-for-Weight-Loss-and-Metabolic-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d5da681-0c91-4f0a-ad27-8871393c9d31 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:12:07 -0400 Hackensack University Medical Center establishes new Center for Weight Loss and Metabolic Health
研究发现肿瘤减灭不会影响转移性结直肠癌的生活质量2023 年 10 月号《JNCCN》《国家综合癌症网络杂志》上的新研究发现，除了标准全身治疗外，强化局部治疗以尽可能多地切除肿瘤（称为“减瘤”）不会影响治疗效果。转移性结直肠癌患者的整体生活质量显着提高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Tumor-debulking-does-not-impact-quality-of-life-in-metastatic-colorectal-cancer-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Tumor-debulking-does-not-impact-quality-of-life-in-metastatic-colorectal-cancer-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49df8245-e788-440a-9c24-91b0936e9c90 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:08:12 -0400 Tumor debulking does not impact quality of life in metastatic colorectal cancer, study finds
新研究显示女性肺癌发病率高于男性美国癌症协会 (ACS) 研究人员领导的新发现扭转了历史模式，显示女性肺癌发病率高于男性，不仅在 50 岁以下的成年人中持续存在，而且现在已扩展到 50 至 54 岁的女性。美国。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/New-study-shows-higher-lung-cancer-incidence-in-women-than-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/New-study-shows-higher-lung-cancer-incidence-in-women-than-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb9042c9-47f8-4b31-8d6a-5655d0fbc086 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:00:35 -0400 New study shows higher lung cancer incidence in women than in men
UTHealth 休斯顿临床试验疗法缩小了胰腺癌患者的肿瘤55 岁的德米特里奥斯·斯特鲁巴基斯 (Demetrios Stroubakis) 于 2021 年 8 月因黄疸被送往急诊室时，以为自己患有胆囊疾病。相反，他对被诊断出患有胰腺癌感到震惊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/UTHealth-Houston-clinical-trial-therapy-shrinks-tumor-of-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/UTHealth-Houston-clinical-trial-therapy-shrinks-tumor-of-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d33adf-7d18-442a-a31f-3aef7fa55937 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:51:00 -0400 UTHealth Houston clinical trial therapy shrinks tumor of pancreatic cancer patient
新疫苗和你：美国人比以往任何时候都更有能力抵御冬季瘟疫去年的“三重流行病”标志着一种新常态的开始：呼吸道感染——RSV、流感和covid-19——将随着每年天气变冷而激增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/The-new-vaccines-and-you-Americans-better-armed-than-ever-against-the-winter-blechs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/The-new-vaccines-and-you-Americans-better-armed-than-ever-against-the-winter-blechs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6e26cbd-5515-4bd2-8c66-f9c826a16ed4 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 09:36:49 -0400 The new vaccines and you: Americans better armed than ever against the winter blechs
随着海洋变暖，罕见的“食肉”细菌向北传播8 月 13 日，黛比·金 (Debbie King) 在墨西哥湾划船一天时，爬上朋友的浮桥，擦伤了右小腿，当时她几乎没有再多想这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Rare-e28098flesh-eatinge28099-bacteria-spreads-North-as-oceans-warm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Rare-e28098flesh-eatinge28099-bacteria-spreads-North-as-oceans-warm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90dd58c9-9e4f-4452-b20e-342035022819 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 09:34:33 -0400 Rare ‘flesh-eating’ bacterium spreads North as oceans warm
BIOHIT HealthCare 将举办网络研讨会，探讨胃肠道医学中的 TDM BIOHIT HealthCare 很高兴地宣布即将举办题为“炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的主动与反应治疗药物监测”的网络研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-webinar-exploring-TDM-in-胃肠道-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-webinar-exploring-TDM-in-胃肠道-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0367adb2-d16f-4a3d-9389-8b8527107915 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 08:15:00 -0400 BIOHIT HealthCare to host webinar exploring TDM in gastrointestinal medicine
